bive.text: I must GO. MUCH MUCH much.. discovery to be done!
Truth seekers never stay in one spot for too long...
Something lurks here, I know it.. I KNOW IT!
THE FIENDS HAVE ENTERED THE ELEVATOR, LEAVE WHEN YOU CAN!
I DONT NEED THIS..
I don't like this you FIEND!
You're against me AREN'T YOU?
This won't hurt me.. will it??
THIS'LL HELP...
Your support is APPRECIATED..
It's in MY HAIR GET OUT
RED CRACKS IN REALITY! KEEP IT AWAY FROM ME.
Your flattery tactics WON'T work, do I look GULLIBLE TO YOU?
Itchyitchyitchy eugh itchy nope no no
Stop spreading your PETALS. THERES NO DIRT TO GROW WITH IN HERE.
Are you PROGRAMMED to spray me with water??
WATER KEEPS THE BRAIN WASHING AWAY
PLEGH..
does this have nanobots do i need a fluoride bath
UGH MY GLASSES...
Now i'm all soggy.. THANKS.
THATS TOO COLD TO BE WATER
DONT THINK I DONT KNOW WHAT YOU'RE TRYING
WHAT do you get by spraying me with water??
YOU CANT MAKE ME.
AGHH SOAP IN MY HAIR
There's no such thing as squeaky clean...
PLEGH. Bubbles...
EUGH. I never liked shampoo.
You must be part of the snow soldier system..
GAH OOF YEWOUWCH..
This "snow" wont stop ME!
GET AWAY FROM ME!
BEING COLD IS A PLACEBO EFFECT.
WATER KEEPS THE BRAIN WASHING AWAY
PLEGH..
UGH MY GLASSES...
CUT THAT OUT
PLEASE CUT THAT
IM SO WARM, NOT COLD! NOT COLD!
I DON'T SMELL LIKE A SKUNK.
This would go great with my homemade coffee HAHA
Why are you booing me?? IM RIGHT
Yuck.. nutrition.. ugh..
KETCHUP ISNT REAL YA KNOW
EUGH, yucky tomato slime..
Is this certified by the clown military??
GET IT OFF GET IT OFF
THE CONFETTI IS MADE OF SKINNED APPLE PEELS..
Does this thing have a speaker on it??
Don't fear monger me... I invented it!
I KNOW THAT THIS ISNT A REAL BOMB, I WOULD KNOW
You wouldn't happen to have gotten this from a clown right??
of course it wouldn't be a real weapon calm down Calm Down
Is this how they pick their SACRIFICES?
what is THAT? WHERE IS IT? OFF OFF OFF
IS THIS A BRAINLINK? IT BETTER NOT BE
I'm not a TARGET. SNRRK HAHA. HAH...
YOU CANT ERASE MY MIND!
My glasses are hypno-PROOF!
DON'T POINT YOUR MIND ERASER AT ME!
You FREAK. I'LL REMEMBER.
I WILL NOT LOOK AT YOUR LIGHT.
IM NOT ALLERGIC TO SALT
THATS MEANT FOR MACHINES. NOT ME.
YOU CAN'T FOOL ME, I KNOW THATS SALT
TWO PLUS TWO EQUALS FOUR NO MATTER WHAT, sorry thinking out loud..
Each piece of candy is carefully crafted by tiny men who live inside the number 2 pencils.
TIME IS STUCK DID YOU KNOW?? I have an ACCURA-watch that tells what time ACTUALLY is and the hands never move.
torchwood factory managers make up 90% of our population.
If you break a no. 2 pencil open fast enough you can catch one of the freaks who live in it off guard before they can escape.
heEheHEHE I AM ON THE VERGE OF TRUE DISCOVERY! Hheheh
NOT MY MONKEYS NOT MY CIRCUS
The Exploitation of cake batter bakers say A LOT ABOUT THE TRUE intentions of the ice cream manufacturers.
ROCKS ARE SQUISHY you just CANNOT look at them or they get scared.
Grinding my teeth grinding my teeth haha
DONT LET THEM TRICK YOU! BREAK THE SYSTEM!
Pleh-ptooee, hair in my mouth-
I can never seem to get a radio frequency here. Interesting.
Batteries get sapped from giraffe weevils every second.
I iitch and itch its so itchy are you itchy?? a little nervous HAHA SORRY
They'll never believe me, they never believe the truth seekers...
Crazy? Who's calling me crazy?! I'm a GENIUS!
they all struggle to explain the weird phenomena in this elevator because they're hiding something from us.
WHERE IS MY CORKBOARD..
The group SEES US we have to find them.
DO YOU SEE THEM TOO?
THEY'RE PLAYING AT THEIR RESIDENCE, THE HEAD IS SOARING.
Have you seen that tube tv?? It makes strange faces at me..
That peircing red eye shadow creature in my dreams... EUGHG.
THE ARCHITECT AND THE BUILDER!
DO YOU SEE IT IN YOUR DREAMS TOO?
I haven't.. seen that parasite lately...
THAT rock hate that rock, not a fan, really not that big of a fan of that rock, it has to know whats happening in our dreams
JUST BECAUSE I UNDERSTAND THINGS YOU CANT DOESNT MAKE ME CRAZY.
I AM ruminating about it! AND I WILL CONTINUE!
OHOHOHOOO
d'ya ever think about how good for energy bugs would be?? SPIDERS ARE FAST.
torchwood factory managers REALLY don't need all of those chips if they're just getting melted.
THE GROUP SEES US we HAVE to find them, sorry thinking out loud again A LITTLE WORRIED TO SAY THE LEAST HAHAHA.
OUGhhh goof greatness, it's a little cold in here Im not Cold Im not Cold Im Warm Warm

drretro.text: meorw puur mreoww!! (Others need tending to!)
meow mrroew!! mew! (Glad to be of service! Bye now!)
meow meow meow mreow. (I'll be leaving now.)
HISS... merow.. (If ANYBODY get hurt, call me..)
Meow purr! (This will help my studies!)
mew mrowwew. (There should be more kind people in the world.)
HISS!!! (Watch it! I don't want soap in my mouth!)
Hiss... (Sugar, I can keep myself clean.)
Meow hiss? (Is this how you treat your doctor?)
Meow hiss? (Can you stop with the lights?)
mreow mow maiu... (Leave it to a doctor to deal with a missing parasite...)
mreeoww mrrp meow maow mrrroww meow mrpp meow! (today's doing ok.)
meowrr, meow mrp! (I may not be a licensed practitioner, but I'm the best I know!)
mrpp mreowr. (Never really been a fan of dentists.)

fleshcousin.text: It's my birthday!
Enter through and stay true.
Flesh contorting to raw code, makes the friend leave getaway.
Flying away now. Flying away. Fly fly. Goodbye.
Slamming waterbottles into the wall resort to departing of strings.
In conclusion, paperweights strive the boiling lava only to be cindered away.
parting ways with days often rely on friends.
Item fight em with a kite um...
Thhhnaank...s...
Hurgghhgh...
HUGRHHHH.. NOOAr..
No acceptance shall tolerate the balance.
PAAAIN PAIN RAIN GO AWAyy...
Rose-ing and dosing and mixing and hitching and singing.
Thank you with a nice object will you give?
Rose on roses on roses on a flowerbed.
Hmmuh mm.. Grrghreat..
Ghaaha... hahaa.... ha.
Liquidated pain servers the nerves.
Will water wallow when warts wear?
Screaming the streaming streams of water..?
Eyes burn with the scraping spleen.
How could splashes of slight be plighted for wwwater....
They set up us the bomb.
Forking over the explosion makes it sad.
Onomatopoeia would like to see ya with the booms and the bams!
Seeing the fours in action fill the vessel with cats and jam.
Throwing the bright lines pines the chimes of a lime.
ARGHRARGH.. RRUGHghh.. HAHARGHH HAH..
The catapult of ichy ice feels great on the radio.
Guh.. Snow is ripe in seasoning..
Clawing at the seams with increasing jubilee.
Striking the cold pole into the cranium reveals fascinating circumstances.
Sliced diced minced crushed and bright red...
GRAhhh... food.. fuord..
Chained to walls climbed up walls just for scraps and rats.
Green leafed red bulbed sources of delight.
RED... squishes of.. juice..
THE FOAMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM
Something this wicked comes way way.
Evil suds out hurt of.
Point arrow foe at friend instead.
Gruuh.. pewhpew!
First person crew gun it goes.
THE SUNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN
HURRRRTTTTT... CRRRRRUMMMBLINNGGGG....
AARRRRGHHHH... RRAGGHKKHHGH...
LIIIIIIIIIIGHTT... STAAURRRP...
RRUNN.... ALLLLLL... OURRTTT NOWWWW...
no
bowl
Soaped and sud swing serenity.
Flugh... clear.
Pluughhh...
Bubbled boards break bars.
Flesh clear with mind peer.
I love the last time when you and I where I first went was fun.
Where is how when the are where with what knowledge?
I am good at alot of not ever anyways but if you were I wouldn't.
Did you just what?
Is what you yes?
Did you whatever,
whatever you I guess?
It was catastro, catastro-feeling good
Who had you was?
ogre anger hanger banger
the food is coming
Where the seven six was never any good there anyhow
keenly observing regular optimizable rocks
What likes do the rakes make while baking the cake?
Shirt music with success of upon people.
Posters bring I allergies.
Here daily revolver tore, bleep sheet.
Cool market structures bring sociological features.
Yes the why you gouge the couch well.
What say you when the food when swing.
Take battle forth through micro-microphone salad!
Yap with intent and where the target of nope.
Studying between the wrongs will grow the barn.
The fresh watermelon shall prevail and be free.

folly.text: Welcome to the eternal limbo.
Prove your worth, dreamer.
Come to join the endless parade of dread?
Choose wisely, mortal flesh.
Let my madness twirl around and around.
Around and around you go. Hmhmhm..
Here lies your watery grave.
Drown in my pure shadow.
The cold, dark sea shall wash you away.
Oh.. does your head hurt? Hmhmhm..
Faster, next time.
The dread consumes.
Smarter than I thought... how 'fun'.
Ngh... How stubborn.
...Lucky guess.
That was indeed refreshing... See you in the elevator... Hmhmhm..
You've proven your worth... Time to wake up.
Sigh... It seems I'm bored. I shall join you on your descent.
Looks like those fleshbags have filled the elevator... Oh well.
Aw, looks like I wasn't invited... Hmhmhm..
I've got better dreams to haunt right now.
Seems as if time shifts in your favor. Hurry.
The flow of time has no meaning here. Better be quick...
Time runs thin, mortal flesh. Hmhmhm...
Too bad... Looks like your eyes need to be... checked out.
Unworthy. Wake up from that weak mind.
Hmhmhm... I'll spare you, this time.
How hideous.
I wont accept your pitiful gestures.
Ugh. So persistent, flesh bag.
This won't change anything.
How pitiful you are... It's quite nice.
Trying to bring peace? Hmhmhm...
The rivers will run red when I'm finished with you.
Ah.. how pitiful.
Small fragile petals... One swipe of the hand, and they shrivel.
Kindness has taught me to never trust another. Not ever again.
You think this will change my ways? Hmhmm.. haha..
You are none the wiser to dance with death.
I see a tsunami, wiping all of your dreams away.
The rivers will run red when I'm finished with you.
Malice and water don't mix, fool.
Such an annoyance.. I should end you where you stand.
I'll send you to a watery grave.
Scrubbing away scars?
Trying to wash your sins away? Hmhmhm..
Mortal actions never cease to confuse me.
I'll pop your body like one of these childish bubbles.
Nothing can wash away those stains.
I'll leave you a special place in that frozen wasteland.
I've felt more cold than you'll ever know.
Your mind shall freeze over when I'm done.
I'll spear an icicle through your cold body.
..Impudent mortal.
Your acts of futility bore me.
Your efforts will rot.
The only thing I feed off of is the fear growing in your heart.
Are you angry? Scared? Helpless?
What an amusing color.. so fresh, and angry.
Sleep with one eye open tonight
A pathetic display of war. I can show you true fear.
Futile... and so naïve
You are blind to what I can do to you.
What a waste. You cannot destroy me
How gruesome.. Hmhmhm...
All the time in the world.. And yet it's wasted.
Trivial toy..
You attack what you fear.
Hm, a reflection of your anger, perhaps?
Your piercing light won't hinder my form.
Unlike that pitiful shark, I don't enrage easily.
I'll blind you with my very claws.
A useless tool from a useless facility. Hmhmhm...
You wouldn't want my eyes to get angry, would you?
I have seen horrors beyond your physical form. You are a speck.
The heart of madness beats on for those tending its malicious garden.
My aspens need tending...
That anger and fear you hold? It tastes great.
I'll scrape you like I did to my tethers.
I hope you enjoy your nightmare tonight.
I am the harbinger, the savior and the catalyst.
Do my searing eyes disturb you? Hmhmmhm..haha.
What, you miss your little rabbit? Hmhmhaha..
I missed autonomy... it's surreal that I am able to crush anything in my grasp.
The cycle of grief repeats once again.
What is that behind you?
Have you really woken up?
I would never scaremonger. This is all really happening.
I can feel the seams of the void slip between each floor. Interesting...
I do enjoy Sebastian's sense of nihility... It's incredibly refreshing, hmhmhm..
This elevator... is infested with spirals.. hmhmhm..

gnarpy.text: YOU'LL ALL RUE THIZ DAY!
DON’T YOU ZORPS ZARE TO FOLLOW ME!
I ZHALL NOT MIZZ ANY OF YOU.
Finally out of zhat box!!
Zrr.. I'll find zhe way back.
ZTOP CHEERING ZO LOUD.
Zuch whimzical dizplayz are zo pathetic.
GAH! ZTOP YOUR ZEEPLEBABBLING!
I DON'T CARE FOR YOUR ZEEPLE ZELEBRATIONS.
You zarn FIEND DON'T TEMPT ME
Thank you for the gift, UNDERLING!
GLORY to the gnarpianz!!
How zlorpful of you!!
Amateur cuizine, FAR too COLD!
IMPUDENT FOOL!
What a HORRID Glozopul GIFT!
Get thiz AWAY FROM ME!
I waz TRAINED for thiz!... ow.
You think thiz rivalz MY tech?
AUGH! Ztupid pitiful light... ow..
NO ONE AZKED YOU TO DO THAT!
Gnarpian tech will ALWAYZ rival ground-dweller TRAZH.
PLEGH! Grozz zmall petalz...
Yez, I know, I am the bezt. You can ztop now.
Are you praizing your Gnarpian lord? ZBLEGH!
Kindnezz will get you nowhere, zorp.
You won't win me over with THEZE!
0UCH! DONT DO THAT.
AA! THATZ COLDE!
WATER will not ztop me..
I KNOW WHAT YOU ARE.
RRRRGH, ZTOP IT!
STOP IT YOU ZEEBLOING!
DON'T MAKE ME ZAY IT
ZTOP THAT NOW!
Water only makes me angry, you ZOPUELY WOPE!
UGHH! eebling zorpy water.
Abzolutely PITIFUL
NOT THE FUR YOU ZANG- URGH!!
GET LOZT!!
Quit throwing your EZOTIC FRUITZ at ME.
Fleezers like you zould get eaten by joinkapedez.
WATCH ZIT!
MY ZAPPER CAN DO MORE DAMAGE!
YOULL RUE THIZ DAY
0UCH! DONT DO THAT.
I'm the perfect being, I do not need to be zurpingly CLEANED!
HIZZ..! I mean. ZTOP THAT!
How glarpingly annoying.
You can't wazh away PERFECTION!
Gnarpianz do NOT take bathz!!!
How.. Trivial, planet-zooper.
HZEY!! ZTOP IT NOW.
Hmph, my BLAZTER iz more powerful.
PATHETIC TECH!
FEEBLE FOAM FREAK!
Y'Know you're lucky I dont have my ZAPPER on me right now..
All of you are foolish, foolish fools
GEEP NOP GNARP GOP!!
I hate thiz.
How would you knowz how to gleep like me…
Grr… Weird guyz around here.
ZLAP ZEEP! Dang fur all ruffled upz!
No gnarp would ever tolerate thiz...
That ztupid park deserved to get invaded!
GAH! These blabbles always in my way.
I really wish I could invade some dumb gleeper right now...
What kind of zlorp zeepes their bop like that!
Gah! These blabbes always in my way.
I hate bugz! Therez no need for those ZILLY glorpz.
I dream of CONQUERING this ztupid place.. and that zorpoblo shadow. hm...
That zhadow thinkz it can juzt dizzapear?? ZHAHAHA!
My zuperior gnarpian hollow armor looks ZO GOOD!!
Fleezers like you zould get eaten by joinkapedez.

infected.text: 1 k1nd4 f0rg3t whY 1 h4v3 th15 L0L. I b4r3ly kn0w th4t l4mp guy!! XD h3 4lw4y5 tr135 t0 4v01d m3 br4h!
Y0 Iz Th15 a D0No?? XD
my d4d is builderm4n br0 he w1ll BAN y0u >:[

I mu5T b3 g3tt1ng b3tt3r!! N0 b4d dr34m5
I sH0UlD 4Sk P4Rty D00d f0r A B-d4Y H4T t0OdaY!

uR 4Ll InV1t3d tO mY Cr1b F0r mY B-dAy P4RtY! 'scUZ3 Th3 S0d4 C4nZ LOL

lampert.text: Glad to leave that filth.
No germs!! I think. I hope.
Waaay too cramped in here for me, hope you don't mind me.
Not too dark here! See ya.
Ugh. That's filled with germs.
Are you TRYING to get me sick?
What made you think I would like that?
Oh uh, thanks.
Hm. I appreciate it.
And you're sure theres no bacteria on this?
How did you even get this? Did he... keep it? Um. Thank you.
What do normal people say when they get stuff..
Gross. These store bacteria on them y'know.
Thanks, I guess??
What does a lamp need petals for?
These float so.. strange-like.
hey.
hey buddy.
If my light shorts out because of you I will shock you.
You should keep liquids away from electronics to prevent electric fires.
Be cautious when wetting fabrics as it can cause mold to form.
This seems dangerous...
Are you trying to tell me something?
I assure you, I'm perfectly clean.
Is that a sanitizer? If not, please keep it away from me...
you're gonna stop doing that
Oh, that doesn't seem sanitary...
Hm, I haven't seen anything like that before
What are you doing?
Are you angry with me?
This feels... irritating?
That's a strange projectile, what is it?
Oh, I've been hit with something.
That's irritating.
Stop doing that.
Those better be new and sanitary darts.
Watch the bulb.
I would guess your cognitive function is below-average.
I'd rather scrub myself, please.
I don't know what I am meant to say to this...
What kind of a scrubber is that?
I'm clean already, last time I checked 48 seconds ago.
You're using low quality soap.
i hope Kasper starts feeling better...
i will never touch that safety rail, just thinking about the lack of sanitation makes me so sick
i enjoy the simplicity of remaining entirely still for days at a time.
im literally so goated at hide 'n go seek, I blend right in.
is this elevator ever cleaned?
we should have a custodian here.
I miss the new furniture smell of ROKEA, It's so clean and comforting.
I love cookies, I wish everything could have the illnesses cooked out of them at 350 F.
Poob can be so loud sometimes..
i hope i can run into Mark or Wallter today.
I lost my favorite key chain recently and I have no idea where it went.
this elevator needs some sort of decontamination procedure or wipes or something,
I don't move when I talk because theres no reason to, you can literally hear what Im saying.
a light switch! haha no one else here gets that.
really not feeling the idea of a box that takes you places without your input on the matter.
I hope one day I'll get to meet some other lamps like me.
Not a huge fan of the cold...
The world actually isn't much bigger than ROKEA.
Hm, the walls in here are so close together.
Still debating in my head which sanitizer is better, gingerbread or peppermint...
The lights here feel different than what I'm used to, nothing wrong with that though.
Someone should really clean those floor buttons...
That little tv needs to get a good scrub.
I thought the people in here would be brighter.
That odd being in my dreams is real interested in my bulb. Annoying.
Glad I got some good rest, must've wiped that nightmare clean.
Most costumes contain so much hyperallergic germs... so gross.

mannequinmark.text: Hey Jim.
I think I left m' plank stock 'round these parts...
I'm outta here like uh' road runner on skates!
Catch ya fellas later! Har har!
On to m'next build!
Any good furnishing 'round here?
How generous of ya! I owe ya one!
Yer a kind soul, thanks!
Har har, thanks fella!
Ugh.. if it weren't fer this stuff..
Get yer' sorry head outta this elevator!
Are you as dumb as a wall??
Err.. I'm good.
No thanks, pardner.
I'm not really fond o' this..
Just t-thing I needed!
If only he was still as sweet as this..
An ice cream a day keeps t'-.. Nevermind.
I can't with ye' gray stuff!
Really? Gray stuff?
Ye' keep annoyin' me with that gray drink, I'll do it again!
Don't b' near me with that cement stuff, it bothers me!
I never got him any..
Har har, you like wood too?
Stop n' smell em? Nah I got stuff t' do!
Thank ya kindly!
Roses ar' just small n' colorful trees!
Yeesh, need more pain tolerance
That's awful rude, ya know.
Watch where yer aimin' them things!
Not in th' mood.
You wouldn't be too happy with one of them toys pointed at you now would ya?
Doesn't hurt to feel clean after a long day's work!
Ain't it a lil' odd to clean wood?
Ooh! Those bubbles sure are purty!
Thanks for the cleanin', pardner!
I'm all spick-n-span!
Yeesh, need more pain tolerance.
Not in th' mood.
That's awful rude, ya know.
Watch where yer aimin' them things!
\*wood noise\*
I love that Weird Al guy. M' favorite song is Hardware Store!
I can't wait to get to my floor, there's a lot I'm looking forwards to there
You don't need bricks for lousy infastructure! Ya gotta get th' good stuff!
Nothin' like a good whiff o' that elevator smell in the morn'!
I may have gotten a few nails stuck in m'head back in the days...
This here hat keeps me from bumpin' my noggin!
I'm workin' hard! Not hardly workin'!
Whaddya’ mean I’m not allowed in the red ball diner?
Gray stuff? Nuh uh! Get some splinters on those bones!
M' favorite piece of hardware has gotta be m' trusty hammer!
I wonder what this here elevator's grain gradin' is...
It's a fine day, WOODn't y'say? Har har har!
I had a great dream about th' aspen trees! Then a weirdo showed up..
Can't believe anuther' colorful brick guy is showin' up now..
Glad m’ dreams are back t’ normal! Just wood!
I found this here costume in th' back of m' closet! Yeeeehaw!

melanie.text: I'm leaving!
Hopefully this'll keep me safe!
Thank you..! It means so much..
You're so generous for g-giving this to me...
O-oh um... I'm okay... Thank you!
Oh.. I'm not worth the trouble... Thank you though!
Maybe someone else could use this!
If only there was so much love in this world..!
So.. red!
Is this a standing ovation? Hehe!
Oh…! Thank you so much!
How sweet of you my friend!
I actually don’t need water, thanks though!
Plegh..!
Hopefully you didn't get any wires..
Alright, alright, that's enough..!
Are you cleaning my screen? Hehe!
Aw, the little smile-smiley guy is cute!
Lampert could use one of those!
Hopefully you didn't get any wires..
Those bubbles look so bright..!
Us b-bunnies really like the cold!
Too cold, too cold!
Oh, did you want to have a snowball fight here?
Good thing I have my jacket!
Agh, you got some in my shoes.
Aw.. Not my jacket...
I guess my p-performance wasn't that good..
Sorry.. I don't really like red things..
Sorry about that.. Y-you dropped something!
That's a b-bit disrespectful!
Yeesh, almost had a p-panic attack!
How... e-explosively nice!
I'm not a voomba!
Ack!
Ougwgh!
It's not good to shoot a TV! For realsies!
That isn't an anti-Melanie gun!
Infected would enjoy that..
It's not good to shoot a TV!
This isn't a safe place to play!
Could you um.. not?
TV's arent usually affected by bright lights.. weird!
Some people could get hurt from that!
Ack! Too bright!
I guess the more light the better...
It's Jump Time!!
I hope Mozelle has her locket somewhere, she can be so clumsy sometimes...
I should doodle a bit to get my mind off things!
Hey um... Is this place well-lit? I'm a bit anxious of the dark.
Pink is such a nice color! Way more relaxed than... red...
My head is just so fuzzy now...
My neck always feels so cold now. My ribs are always sore as well...
I really didn't wanna come back here, but I wanna do good by my new friends!
No darn parasite is gonna keep me down..!
The acoustics here are really nice, it just makes me wanna burst out into song!
Feels good to be back! I think...
These people really lack joy in their lives... I can fix that!

mozelle.text: How generous, I should knight you!
You have my thanks, dear companion!
How dare you bring that filth to your princess!

null.text: We hope you enjoyed this experience.
Goodbye, for now.
May Icarus shine upon all.
We'll be seeing you.
We thank you, kindly, stranger.
This is useless for our system.
We would like to live similar to a flower.
We thank you, kindly, stranger.
We are excited from our prime as well.
Thank you, and grace to Icarus.
We act humble towards your gesture.
Thank you for granting this to us.
We feel quite odd from this.
Unfortunately, pain factors are needed for the prime.
Water effects can cause bugs, sometimes.
Simulate: pleh. Plugh. gross.
Unnecesarily sloppy.
Cleaning poultry before it's slain.
We appreciate the gesture.
Though we could only wish, our sins cannot be cleansed.
Our metal will shine like the sun.
Polishing the prime is of upmost importance.
Snow seems everchanging. Hm.
Please, do not persist.
Futile against such automations.
Indefatigable.
Please have consideration for the prime.
You must understand, we are no chicken.
Cease, we plead.
Food simulators are so odd.
Human humor must be studied for prime.
We forgot to anchor that.
Pitiful.
What are you to achieve?
A gift from the one, surely?
We are sure to understand that the party nears.
Humans are so privy to mistakes.
We may have to remove your item privileges. Be wary.
Such arms do not resolve anything.
Such arms do not resolve anything.
How childish.
Our eyes fixate and adjust quickly.
Be mindful.
The illusion of achievement.
Passed around by the afterlife, it brings smiles to the masses. Somebody will soon come and oil the rusty parts.
Heeding into the one who cried wolf, it has no care in the world. It's family worries.
Can after can, drop after drop. It will die one day, such as anything else. But when is ignorance, truly bliss?
Cursed of hideous form, where empathy lacks, riches are gained. The mandibles clutch onto what it only has left.
Governing the deepest pits of the underworld, it wields an iron, yet pink fist under the guidance of its ascendant.
Cutting ties with your only hope can break you down. Slowly, your machine feeds into hate.
Those pits hide so many horrors. Not just shwaffles.
I truly mean nothing personal. But I deserve this chance.
Death is a vital key in life, so the parasite says. How odd it seems that the rabbit worries itself so.
A question never asked is one never found. Circuits and batteries will whisper sweet lies.
A fine actor in the dance of death, but a facade all the same. The branches still grow with hate.
Shattered minds are common here. The mind spills as its friend searches for answers.
Greed and steel clash in the code. How high of a number is needed to seek joy?
An ego as big as the galaxy, its species will ravage, pillage, and conquer all. Hope shall be crushed under its paw.
Animals of nothing, guided by nothing. It's skin rots and stinks of the wild. It shall soon populate everything.
A care as clean as soap. It is muddled with the growth of friendship of a sickly being.
Happiness comes at a price, a lifetime of suppression. If only they did cut you open that night.
Burdened with the death of a world, it clings to bloodied metal and rust, grieving all the same.
The waning mind and the pursuit of family is for naught. The only hope is left in the automaton.
Rolling through life with a bag of regrets, it does anything to save those closest, and furthest to the truth.
Yearning for absolute power, back to the top. The wax wings show no signs of melting.
The newfound happiness is clouded with anxiety. It will do anything possible to save another, but at what cost?
Wielding a weapon of the gods carries a heavy toll on one's soul. be still.
The ship of Theseus clings to its rotten boards. How many times have our scripts gone through the same?
How quickly a mind corrodes is yet to be fathomed by mankind. The waning sense of self continues.
An old soul driven to tears, the water mixes with bark. It must find a new happiness.
So many have learned to hate. It's often seen as saddening.

pest.text: こんにちは ! 今日は素敵な日です。(Hello! Today is a wonderful day.)
あなたに会うたびに私の一日は悪化します。(My day gets worse every time I see you.)
I was gonna take this from you, but thanks.
I have no need for this trash.
How would you like it if I threw petals in your face?
まあ...悪くねえかもな。(Well... not that bad maybe.)
Better stop before you get hurt.
いいえ! これは許されません! パンタロンのコンパートメント を空にしましょう。(No! This cannot be forgiven! Now empty the compartments of your pantaloons.)
I should spill soap in your eyes.
Get that thing to stop smiling at me.
I wore a sweater for a reason.
What was the point of throwing that?
I only EAT tomatoes. Not get hit by them.
I'm sure that was worth the mess.
\*hiss\* Could you not get that all over me?
I'll make you eat that dart.
Do you think this is funny?
頭おかしいんじゃないの? (you are crazy, aren't you?)
So clever, using a light on a bug.
How annoying do you have to be?
このエレベーターは人が少ない方がずっといい。(This elevator is much better when there are fewer people.)
機械... 機械... 私は創造することが大好きです。(Machines... Machines… I love creating.)
もっと資金が必要だ。(More funds are needed)
That button floor seems very interesting, hehehe...
Twenty, forty, sixty... What? Nothing, don't worry about it.
This music is too loud, I wish you guys would stop talking.
Just need some donations… Then I’ll be set.
I wish I could just get there already...
Stop asking where the coins are going, I don't have them.
What about my mandibles? It's none of your business.
What are you looking at me for. Huh. What.
That thing needs to get out of my dream. Or else.
Hm. Suddenly I’m in the mood for some fishi sticks. Weird.
What? Never seen a bloodsucking bug before? Yeesh.

pilby.text: ooh waowee, I hope I can get an apple here..
Another stop? Why can’t I just be back home with momma? :O(
D'ohh, what a scary elevator..
That's um.. really kind of you..
Oh.. thanks.. :0)
You're really generous, golly..
Oh um.. I don't wanna impose..
Golly um.. no.. thank you.. :0(
Thanks..! But no thank you..
Momma got me these when I graduated...
Golly.. They're the same color as an apple..
You really think I'm.. alright? :0(
Doh.. I should'nt deserve these..
Reminds me of home..
now im just sopping...:'0(
please stop..
i need a towel now..
\*sniffle\*water makes me so sad
W-water?
Golly, did I make you upset?
I'm not a cat, I'm a caterpillar!
G'ohhh, am I crying again?
Oh fiddle faddle, do I have a towel on me?
oughhh, stop :'0(
Oh dear, now I'm all damp.
Please don't dunk my head in soap... again...
I should clean up my act and go home..
D-do I smell bad..? :0(
Those bubbles look nice...
Doh.. I guess I stink...
oughhh, stop :,0(
cold and hurt :,0(
why must you be so cold
Augh!
that's so cold...
ouch :0(
Owch! I'm sorry please stop!
Oumf, I should've expected this...
Yeouch! That's awful mean...
Uegh, cold.
Dawww, what'd I do wrong?
Golly, it's like im performing again...
Ough, what was that for, huh?
What'd I do wrong? :0(
Ouughh, was the performance that bad? D'ohhh..
WAH! why'd you do that??
ACK! I'm sorry, I promise I'll be a better clown!
Uwaugh, what?
Please be more polite.. if you can.. :0(
Have some \*sob\* dignity..
Nono.. no.. my eyes really hurt from that..
Ouch..! \*hurtful honk\*
WAH! Doh.. my eyes..
D'ohh gosh sniffle I miss mama
I feel so blue today...
Oh fiddle faddle, where'd my balloon go?
Well this isn't fun at aaalllll.
Guh, I miss my fluffy bed.
Maybe I'm just not cut out for the clown life. :o(
Heugh, I wish my best buddy were here :o(
Waowee, that ceiling sure is tall! Or am I just small? D'ohhh...
I wonder what Split is doing today? Golly, i bet it's something cool. :0(
bet I'd feel better if I had something sweet to eat, uegh.
Hoohh, they should have a bird painting in there.
Darn it, my apple is bruised.
Guhh, I wish I could fly. Maybe I'll get to grow up like the other caterpillars one day?
D'ohhh,I wish people weren't so scary
Oh no, oh dear, i've spilled my pretzels!
I keep having dark, shadowy nightmares.. :O(
I’ve been havin’ dreams of my momma.. they’re bittersweet :'0)
I finally got myself an apple, but I'm all out of frosting.
Who sells apples without the frosting? \*discontented honk\*
Ough, why is everything here so darn taaalll?
Doh... Momma always liked candy corn..

i gota check this place out!!
this is so so cool! yaaay!!
my fav flavrr! how did u kno?
I GOT SO EXCITED I ATE IT ALL sry
r these from crem? they r so gud!
u nevr fail to make me smile!
ill get u a rlly gud present next time!
ur too kind! ill keep evry petal!

imagin how many piñatas u could make wit all dis!
wud b more fun if it wuz confetti instead!!! :3
oh yea oh yea oh yea!
isnt it fun to be clean?
i like the lil' smiling face
jus dont get soap in my eyes!
cake baking is an art, but I don't realy like cakes!
my life is liek a video game i think
im so so excited for this party i have for tomorrow, and the day after, and the day after that.
did u kno,, EVERY day is my birthday.
Fizzy drinks r my fave when goin to big partiez!
i wuz gonna bring a party popper in here, but i got too excited...
whadda flip!? thiz isnt party music!
my earz r still ringing after that one party...
Wai dont you have a party hat on? cmon and get crazyee!
that subway wuz so dark! Can't have a party withowt silly litez!
raise the roof, get ur partay on!!
wutz your favurite ice cream? i like that one flaver...
i thought there were sum presentz in here!
hav you seen the super duper ooper cool room with the dance floor?

i shuld ask that little colorful brick guy to party with me!
i dreamt that al my frends wer havin fun!!
look look! im like pilby!! honkhonk!

prototype.text: oh woaw what a weird place!
This is my stop!! I think!!
I'll make good use out of this!
Maybe someone else could make use of that!
My robotic self doesn't really need this!
ZZT- That's a lot, thank you!!
This is so fun! I love it here!
Careful! I could zap you with that!
My shell is too durable for any liquid!
Plegh!! Good thing i'm air conditioned!
Robots and water do NOT mix.
I guess my scanners need a good cleaning!
I wonder if my creator ever cleaned me...
Thank you for cleaning these joints!
Scag would find a way to sell shampoo bubbles!
HEY! WATCH THE W-W- [KZT KZT] WIRES!
Hey! HEY! I don't wanna be red..
Stop! you'll get on my wires!!
I sense a 0.5 chance of productivity!
Is this a useful thing to do?
BZZT- That almost blew my faceplate off!
I hope this doesn't damage any of my wires...
WOAH! That was so unexpectedly COOL!
[PROCESSING...] WOW! So that's what that does?? NEAT!
BZZT- That almost blew my faceplate off!
Ooh! That sticks to my metal
My scent processors love the factory! Mm.. burnt coal...
He he! Found some new data!
My mask is completely impemtrable.. Inpenebrable?? Impenetrable!!
My hand doubles as a bowl mixer!
My processors love fabrics! And metals.. And materials.. And textures..
My teeth can crunch anything!! Chomp chomp!
What's outside the elevator when we're moving??
I erm.. Still dunno what I was made for..!!
Look at my big jaw!! Chomp chomp chomp!

reddy.text: Closing time! Thank you for choosing Red Ball Diner!
Haha, to the pit with y-you, kiddo!
This is not permitted for Redball animatronics!
Thank you for the g-g-gift, friend!
Don’t forget to t-tip your waiter!
Foliage is n-not permitted inside Anim-animatronics.
BZZT- Red Diner Ball always uses the freshest ingredients!
Please- KZZT- Do not throw food in the establishment!
Come BZZRT- get our tastiest tomato sauce!
Reddy promises that our tomatoes taste the best!
No throwing objects in Red Ball facilities!
Firearm is not allowed w-within [ERROR] kilometers of the Red Ball Diner.
Please r-remove object_foam dart from- KZZRTT-
D-damage to Red Ball Diner property is prohibited.
Hit the target to win a t-ticket!
Make sure to get your SQUISHY BIRTHDAY MEAL s-special!
Please refrain from ha-ha-harming Red Ball Diner property.
S-Staff can refuse to clean up your m-m-mess.
Re-Re-Remember to book parties with our staff ahead of time!
Please don't point bright lights at the \*KZZRT\* animatronics!
Laser pointers are not allowed on premise.
Haha, better stop before your friend Reddy throws you in the pit!
I love serving guests at the Red Ball Diner!
Our special of the day is CH-CH-CH-CHEESE BURGERS.
Red Ball has been established W-W-WORLDWIDE!
Please see the counter for QUEST-QUESTIONS.
Have you checked out our bo-bo-bonus package?
No, I am not equipped with a pizza ma-maker.
We are not res-res-responsible for any injuries.

YOU MUST BRING ME THERE MY FRIEND

STOP ATTACKING ME, I AM THE ONE WHO ATTACKS

split.text: See ya later alligator!
Welp, time for me to make like a tree and leaf!
Hmm, I wonder if I should get something for Bive while I'm here!
Time for me to Split! Hehe.
That was fun! Riding on an elevator is such an uplifting experience!
Hehe, thanks friend!
Why, this is 'bananas!'
Thanks a 'bunch!'
Oh, this is a bit 'rotten...'
I'm al-'ripe'!
This isn't 'berry' nice..
Aww split!
This is a new 'budding' friendship!
You're so sweet!
I should get some for her..
My mood just 'rose'!
Hehe, was I that funny?
AGH!!
Ogh! You gotta be joking me.
Agh, don't do that!
Plpplt!! 'Water' you doing!?
Do you have 'bottled' up anger?
Gotta keep my hygiene at an all time high for the show!
I don't have any bruises on my peel, do I?
Always good to clean your fruits!
Well, those bubbles make me feel all-ripe!
Hm! Maybe Bive could use some of that...
OUGH!
AGH, that's colder than a banana split!
HEY! thats cold.
Brrr!! Frozen banana slices!
Yipe! That got me shivering!
Well that's aw-pulp-y rude!
AGH, that's more disgusting than chicken-flavored ice cream!
No need to spread that mush-yness!
HEY! That's mushy!
This isn't really my jam..
HEY! that's.. c4?
Be careful I have a short fuse!
OH now THIS is a blast!
That's some explosive fun right there!
Bet I look like a sprinkle split right now.
I'm just blown away! Hah!
You better 'squash' where you're aiming that!
'Split' me with your best shot!
Haha that tickles!
Ouch ouch ouch!
Hey! that wasn't 'berry' nice!
Hey! Don't get all 'flashy!'
Hey.. You're not too 'bright!'
Gimme a break!
That's gonna turn my brains into banana pudding!
Ouch! Gotta readjust my glasses.
A friend of mine told me that their apples were yellow, and then I was like, "That's bananas!"
Me and my friends are never lonely, because we hang around in BUNCHES!
I find most music to be rather aPEELing!
I have so many banana puns in my head right now, its nuts.
My friend lended me some food yesterday at lunch, so I said, "Thanks a BUNCH!"
This elevator is bananas, It reminds me of my aunts bee farm!
What rhymes with banana? No it doesn't!
I'm peeling GREAT right now!!
Yellow? Who's there?
What's the easiest way to make a banana split? You show it the door.
That maze room makes me so dizzy. Reminds me of the time I got really dizzy at the doctors!
I always feel pretty ripe in the morning!
I've gotten pretty cold in here! Feels like banantarctica!
I hope I can make some sides SPLIT with my jokes!
My friend looked at me like I was... crazy! Orange you glad I didn't say bananas?
What do you call two bananas? A pair of slippers!
My grandma is one tough 'nana!'
Bivey left her radio at my house, shes been coming pretty 'frequently!'
Boy, I sure hope Banry's doing alright..
My cousin, twice removed, really enjoys pharmaceuticals!
Boy, I sure had a ROTTEN dream last night...
I can take some criticism for my jokes, I’m thick-skinned!
Nan would go bananas here!
Boy, I sure had a RIPE dream last night!
Haven't seen Melanie in awhile... I wonder how she is!
What do you call a banana with loads of cash? Banana bread!

spud.text: Spud!
I feel.. Uh.. sick.. Really spud.. Sick..
Uh.. Was spud.. I supposed to go.. Here..
Hopefully theres.. Uh.. food?? Around.. Here? Spud.
Is.. spud.. It safe.. For me..?
Spud spud.. bye.. My head hurts..
This makes spuds.. head feel.. nice..
I really.. like this.. thank you.. um..
Um.. thanks..
Nonono.. I’m not okay.. with that..
I dont.. really like this..
Maybe.. something nice.. instead..?
Is spud not cool as is?.. Spud..
Too cold for spud..!
Brr! Spud no spud spud..
Thank you Spud but spud have spud one
Oh uh.. Spud.. thanks..
These relax spud's.. head..
I.. Spud.. enjoy your company..
Weird little red.. Dots.. hmm..
I feel like.. I remember spud.. roses..
Ah. Spud.. Tastes familiar..
Squishy.. Spud.. And wet spud..
What was that for spud..?
Hey spud spud.. That was spud.. Rude.
Spud I.. ew..?
Watch the bucket.. spud..
Refreshing.. spud
Ah.. that cools spud off
Ah..!! That scared spud..
Spud.. uh.. alright?..
Uh.. Thanks for shining.. my helmet..
Thanks.. Makes spud feel okay.
Smells like... cheap pine shampoo..
It feels good to um.. be clean..
Spud..
Ah.. I remember the spud.. cold..
At least.. that wasn't as painful as.. spud..
Why would you.. do that.. spud..
SPUD!! Uh.. cold..
GUH!!.. ow..?
Whos.. birthday is it..? I don't remember mine..
GUH!!.. Scared... me..
Hm.. What a.. weird.. contraption.. spud..
Don't do this.. Not again..
Spud.. oh.. party.. confetti..?
Narf?? Seems.. familiar..
Doh.. hurts my head..
Spud.. that.. doesn't feel okay..
Blugh.. ouch..
My head feels all.. spud.. wonky..
Spud... sensitive to light...
Owww.. my head hurts um.. from that..
Don't um.. play with that...
Guh.. too bright.. need bucket..
Ow.. please um.. put that away.. spud..
Next time, spud's really gonna do it.
spudspud spud ANGER. spud spud.
spud spud spud..
spud spud SPud, spud spud..
SPUD SPUD! Spud, spud spudspud...
I can actually uh... speak very fluently in english, I'd just um.. rather some people not know that. (spud spud)
When I was a.. Uh.. a camp counselor we used to play this game I uh.. called 'juggle rocks!' it never ended well.
I hate that um... dumb green cat.
Bubble noises haha I'm stupid
I actually used to er... be human before a weird cat alien... thing RUDELY made me into uh... this
Spud spud GNARPY spudSpud spud!
I miss erm.. being a camp counselor... spud spud spud..
SPUD spud, with the.. Spud and the awesome.. Spud!
Sometimes um.. My mind gets really cloudy.. Maybe uh.. More often than not.
Have you seen that um.. One floor with that.. Thing and... hm...
SPud, spuddity spud spud. Sorry, just uh.. practicing.
I always get so angry when... um.. erm.. I think of that horrible green thing... spuD..
I was thinking of um.. Something.. I guess I forgot again..
spudSPUD! I think I remember... ah, no. Nevermind.
Why do.. Oh.. erm, so many weird things happen at camp?
I used to tell some um.. Amazing stories.. Now I don’t remember them… much.
Spud sPud, I miss my marshmallows..
I feel erm.. like spud is forgetting um.. something.. or someone..
My erm.. head still spud.. hurts from that.. dark dream.. ugh..
I haven't had... any bad dreams.. spud.. lately..

stat.text: WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!
It wasn't really that nice! Bye!
Hopefully we don't meet again!
Finally I can unclench my teeth!
Gosh, finally. Ugh.
Glad to be out!
I don't accept things from murderers
I don't take things from people that I don't know!
Please give me some space!
No thanks! I'd really rather not.
I'd be an idiot if I took this!
I can just.. have this? Thanks!
Thanksssssssss
I don't accept things from murderers, but I'll take it!
Thanks!
Thanks
You got some in my hair.
I could've been allergic to those! You never know!
Can you give me something useful please?
Thanks, but I do not know you.
I REEAAALLY appreciate it. Truly.
Could you give me food or maybe medical supplies instead?
I'm not in the mood at the moment, please give me some space!
While it's not ideal, I'll accept this anyways!
Thank you!
I JUST got this drycleaned.
Imagine going up to someone and spraying their face with water. Just imagine.
I'm PLENTY hydrated. Thanks. Really.
You can be a bit nicer! I truly mean it!
Please, don't do that again.
okay.
Do you understand how rude this is?
Those popping bubbles get a bit annoying!
I'm really not in the mood for that!
Not a great time to clean something, don't you think?
Please, don't add salt to the wound.
I didn't know you were capable of cleaning, murderer!
I am not in snow attire.
Wow! Stop!
Mind your manners.
I'd prefer if you wouldn't!
You must be very popular!
You must have SOOO many friends.
Throwing food is a bit barbaric, isn't it?
You're wasting food that could go to people in need.
Throw your food SOMEWHERE ELSE! PLEASE?
Ew.. gross..
I just got this drycleaned.
That beeping is a bit annoying! Reminds me of you!
Can you be a little nicer, for everyone's sake? Thanks!
I don't think doing that to someone is normal!
Wow! You made a mess with the confetti!
I don't think you need these!
Aren't you a bit old to be playing with toys?
I wish a lot more people in the world would learn to be polite!
Maybe you can play with your toys somewhere else! Away from me maybe!
I'd really love it if you wouldn't be so irritating!
Aren't you a bit old to be shooting people with darts?
I'd really love it if you wouldn't. do. that.
Please stop bothering me.
You must not be very nice!
Wow! Stop!
I'd prefer if you wouldn't!
I wish a lot more people in the world learned how to be polite!
Point that thing somewhere else, please!
That REALLY makes my eyes hurt, by the way!
I think you should learn when to stop!
Wow, my head hurts!
ACK! Ugh..
Can you maybe go take a shower? You smell!
If you don't have any sweets on you, buzz off please!
My hair doesn't classify as 'air vents', learn some manners
These people make me wanna grit my teeth! My jaw hurts!
Isn't my bow cute? ...Actually I don't need your opinion!
This place doesn't sit right with me!
I miss home so much.
Don't you hear the elevator breathing?
Did you really have to do that to my home?
You intruders had no place to be near my machine...
You intruders had no place to be near my Sam.
I'm really hoping Sam is okay.
My jaw hurts from how much I've been gritting my teeth!
You should be ashamed of yourself for what you did to Sam.
My Sam is never coming back, you took her from me.
You've taken everything from me.
I've never felt more ashamed to be in the same room as someone else more than i do now.
If you didn't show up at all Sam would have been okay.
Now I have nothing.
What floor are you leaving on?
The only thing I had has been taken away from me.
Would you stop staring? Thanks!

walter.text: How quaint! Goodbye, friends.
Splendid, I can get back to my poetry.
I think I left my cement stock around these parts...
I wonder if I can get Gray Stuff here...
I hope there's some beautiful concrete around here!
Thank you, friend!
I'll cherish this forever!
What a nice gesture.
Ah, such a great grey gift!
Why, I thank you, friend!
How'd you know this is my favorite?
Hm.. how about some grey stuff?
I don't fancy this, sorry.
Ah, no thank you, my dear friend.
It's no grey stuff, but it is refreshing.
My, my, what a sweetheart you are!
Your gestures melt my heart, friend!
Well, you're too thoughtful.
My, aren't you delightful.
Do you have a love for concrete as well?
These always smell so serene.
At least you GOT me flowers.. Oh, sorry friend.
A grey stuff shampoo would smell nice...
Those bubbles are as spherical as my head!
Well, I guess a good scrub couldn't hurt!
A good cleaning never hurt a soul!
My my, how nice of you!
You've just interrupted a very important thought!
My my, that's quite rude!
Have some manners!
Usually such objects aren't noticed by my fine skin, How annoying.
Please quit that.
thinking is like talking to a brick wall
walls are meant to be made of amazing bricks
i cannot stop thinking about bricks
i really want some grey stuff right now...
I've never really been a musician, but I quite fancy playing the piano.
I regret getting on this elevator
Kinda quiet in here.
That one idiosyncratic floor with the yellow walls has some beautiful architecture
I dislike that uncanny gradient guy, whenever I see it I feel unpleasant
Apparently gray stuff is bad for your health, but I can't get enough of the stuff.
I yearn for grey stuff at this time...
Do you fancy a bit of elevator jazz? I wish they had more classical melodies.
I would love to play a tune for you all! Unfortunately, I do not have my piano anywhere...
My favorite things are mostly high brow. Just like myself!
Why not take a break and smell the amazing flowers.. Somewhere?
I could use a plentiful jog right about now!
I cannot stop thinking about beautiful bricks
Walls are meant to be made of amazing bricks
This contraption could really use some better framing, I do say so myself.
Wrecking balls need to be outlawed, just a pity that good walls fall to those monsters.
Thinking is similar to talking to a brick wall
To pass the ongoing hours, I enjoy freeform poetry, it's magnificent!
It's peculiarly quiet in here.
Have you seen the latest issue of Building Digest? It was simply astounding!
Concrete has got to be one of man's greatest creations! How else would architecture thrive?
He never enjoyed gray stuff.. In fact, he got angry.. hm..
Friend, have you seen any vending machines here? I require some gray stuff...
Who says gray stuff is addictive?
I saw that figure with the odd beret in my dream last night. She's peculiar!
Hm.. seems that woman has vanished.. How sad! I loved her poems.
Despite being a rather big fan of architecture and the arts, I don't fancy myself doing interior decoration.
Pretty spooky, don't you think?

fish.text: I've seen civilizations rise and fall over my millions of years on this Earth.
I have trained over 1000 years to breathe on land
I may be a fish, but I also have a soul.
I'm hungry i need fish food
I may be a fish but i also have a soul
Your minds can't comprehend the space outside these walls.
can someone turn down the AC
Can someone move me out of the elevator, I want to see what’s out there.
No more water. I only want red juice
